ru: Поднятую стопу поставьте на коврик целиком.
Опорную кисть поставьте строго под плечевым суставом.
Одну голень поместите скрестно поверх другой.

en: Direct your gaze along the line of your outstretched hand.
enSynonyms: Focus your eyes along the path of your extended hand.
Let your gaze follow the length of your outstretched hand.
Keep your eyes aligned with the direction of your stretched hand.
Draw your gaze forward, following the line of your extended hand.
Maintain your focus along the reach of your outstretched hand.
Guide your eyes to trace the line of your stretched hand.
Set your gaze along the length of your extended arm and hand.
Hold your gaze steady, looking along the line of your outstretched hand.
Fix your eyes on the direction your stretched hand is pointing.
Align your gaze with the flow of your extended hand.
